TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 或 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the or event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个，它指定与每个用户按下、 是否在同一时间，按下任何修饰符键 （CTRL、 ALT 和 SHIFT） 传递的关键字或事件。A , which specifies the key the user pressed and whether any modifier keys (CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT) were pressed at the same time, is passed with each or event. 事件发生在用户按任意键时。The event occurs when the user presses any key. 当用户释放键时发生的事件。The event occurs when the user releases the key. 重复事件发生键重复发生，每次时如果按住键，但仅有一个用户释放键时，生成事件。Duplicate events occur each time the key repeats, if the key is held down, but only one event is generated when the user releases the key. 事件也会发生时按下某个键。The event also occurs when a key is pressed. 一个与每个传递事件，并指定了由每个按键由于组成的字符。A is passed with each event, and specifies the character that was composed as a result of each key press. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检测键按下的状态。The following code examples demonstrate how to detect the state of a key press. **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有事件类，以显示弹出样式的应用程序的用户的帮助。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event with the class to display pop-up style Help to the user of the application. 该示例使用属性传递给事件处理程序方法进行筛选的所有变体按 F1 键和修改键。The example uses the properties passed to the event handler method to filter for all variations of pressing the F1 key with a modifier key. 当用户按 F1，包括任何键盘修饰符，任何变体类将显示一个弹出窗口，类似于，在控件旁边。When the user presses any variation of F1 that includes any keyboard modifier, the class displays a pop-up window, similar to a , near the control. 如果用户按下 ALT + F2，不同的帮助弹出窗口会显示其他信息。If the user presses ALT+F2, a different Help pop-up is displayed with additional information. [!code-cpp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/VB/form1.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的示例确定是否与用户按下 ALT + E，如果鼠标指针位于，允许用户编辑的。The following example determines whether the user pressed ALT+E, and if the mouse pointer is over a , allows the user to edit that . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#3)] **示例 3****Example 3** 下面的示例确定用户是否按下一个非数字密钥，以及如果是这样，将取消通过使用事件属性。The following example determines whether the user pressed a non-numeric key, and if so, cancels the event by using the property. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过此事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

value.span: 表示跳过控件的默认处理； 表示还将该事件传递给默认控件处理程序。

span.span: to bypass the control's default handling; otherwise, to also pass the event along to the default control handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 Windows 窗体中的不同控件以不同方式实现。 is implemented differently by different controls within Windows Forms. 控件，例如的子类本机 Win32 控件，它被解释为表示键的消息不应传递到基础本机控件。For controls like which subclass native Win32 controls, it is interpreted to mean that the key message should not be passed to the underlying native control. 如果您设置`Handled`为 true 的，控件不会传递按键`events`给基础 Win32 文本框控件，但它仍将显示用户键入的字符。If you set `Handled` to true on a , that control will not pass the key press `events` to the underlying Win32 text box control, but it will still display the characters that the user typed. 如果你想要阻止当前控件接收键按下，使用属性。If you want to prevent the current control from receiving a key press, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例确定用户是否按下一个非数字密钥，以及如果是这样，将取消通过使用事件属性。The following example determines whether the user pressed a non-numeric key, and if so, cancels the event by using the property. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: 作为事件的键代码的 值。

span.span: A value that is the key code for the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定按下了哪个密钥。The following code examples show how to use the property to determine which key was pressed. **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有事件类，以显示弹出样式的应用程序的用户的帮助。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event with the class to display pop-up style Help to the user of the application. 该示例使用属性传递给事件处理程序方法进行筛选的所有变体按 F1 键和修改键。The example uses the properties passed to the event handler method to filter for all variations of pressing the F1 key with a modifier key. 当用户按 F1，包括任何键盘修饰符，任何变体类将显示一个弹出窗口，类似于，在控件旁边。When the user presses any variation of F1 that includes any keyboard modifier, the class displays a pop-up window, similar to a , near the control. 如果用户按下 ALT + F2，不同的帮助弹出窗口会显示其他信息。If the user presses ALT+F2, a different Help pop-up is displayed with additional information. [!code-cpp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/VB/form1.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的示例确定是否与用户按下 ALT + E，如果鼠标指针位于，允许用户编辑的。The following example determines whether the user pressed ALT+E, and if the mouse pointer is over a , allows the user to edit that . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#3)] **示例 3****Example 3** 下面的示例确定用户是否按下一个非数字密钥，以及如果是这样，将取消通过使用事件属性。The following example determines whether the user pressed a non-numeric key, and if so, cancels the event by using the property. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 或 事件的键数据。

span.span: Gets the key data for a or event.

value.span: 一个 ，表示按下的键的键代码以及修饰符标志（指示同时按下的 Ctrl、Shift 和 Alt 键的组合）。

span.span: A representing the key code for the key that was pressed, combined with modifier flags that indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed at the same time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用从常量提取信息从属性。You can use constants from to extract information from the property. 使用按位 AND 运算符比较返回的数据含常量的以获取有关哪些密钥与用户按下的信息。Use the bitwise AND operator to compare data returned by with constants in to obtain information about which keys the user pressed. 若要确定是否已按下某个特定修饰符键，请使用， ，和属性。To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#48)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#48)]

public: property System::Windows::Forms::Keys Modifiers { System::Windows::Forms::Keys get(); };

summary.span: 获取 或 事件的修饰符标志。

span.span: Gets the modifier flags for a or event.

summary.span: 这些标志指示按下的 Ctrl、Shift 和 Alt 键的组合。

span.span: The flags indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed.

value.span: 值，该值表示一个或多个修饰符标志。

span.span: A value representing one or more modifier flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否已按下某个特定修饰符键，请使用， ，和属性。To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the , , and properties. 修饰符标志可以组合使用按位 OR。Modifier flags can be combined with bitwise OR. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪个修改键已按下以及为主键。The following code example shows how to use the property to determine which modifier keys were pressed along with the primary key. [!code-cpp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示键事件是否应传递到基础控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key event should be passed on to the underlying control.

value.span: 如果键事件不应该发送到该控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key event should not be sent to the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将分配`true`到此属性中的事件处理程序，如以防止用户输入。You can assign `true` to this property in an event handler such as in order to prevent user input. 设置到`true`还会设置到`true`。Setting to `true` also sets to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例阻止访问数字键击名为控件`textBox1`。The following code example prevents numeric keystrokes from reaching the control named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/keyeventargs.suppresskeypress/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/keyeventargs.suppresskeypress/vb/form1.vb#1)]
